content:
I did a minor update to one of my modules (Me Aliases), then went to verify that the update was showing on the modules search page...and boy, was it, ten times on the page:
https://backdropcms.org/modules?s=Me+Aliases
I've never seen this with any other module search. Any ideas why?
And a related question: what's the best place to post issues related to backdropcms.org pages?

what's the best place to post issues related to backdropcms.org pages?

https://github.com/backdrop-ops/backdropcms.org/issues

backdrop-ops/backdropcms.org
Issue tracker for the BackdropCMS.org website. Contribute to backdrop-ops/backdropcms.org development by creating an account on GitHub.
and i see the same you do re the multiple listings. tried searching for other modules, no other one does this. weird

Thanks. Issue submitted: https://github.com/backdrop-ops/backdropcms.org/issues/736

Module Search returns the same module multiple times · Issue #736 · backdrop-ops/backdropcms.org
A search for the "Me Aliases" module by title returns 10 entries for the same module: https://backdropcms.org/modules?s=Me+Aliases Haven't seen this with any other module.
We had a short discussion on search yesterday where the exact name wasn't showing, but single words did. Maybe they messed with it last night and now it's all goofy?
I was still seeing that behavior earlier today.

I posted on that behavior, too: https://github.com/backdrop-ops/backdropcms.org/issues/737

Module Search should match on module title but doesn't · Issue #737 · backdrop-ops/backdropcms.org
Role Help (role_help) is a Backdrop module: https://backdropcms.org/project/role_help But a search on "Role Help" on the Modules page doesn't return it: https://backdropcms.org/module...
